channel.title: Plz help rep++
channel.description:
when i try to load my client i get this error: Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4708) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:150) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:144) at client.run(client.java:4488) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
i looked at the lines and this is what they said: 4708- aClass42_Sub1_1068.method553(); 150- method8(493); 144- method3(4747); 4488- super.run();
i have never seen it before, what do i do?
also the screen on the client displays this error: sorry, an error has occurred with the client and shows steps on how to fix it, i have encountered this on rs before but not the loaderror thing.

item.title: Plz help rep++
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

when i try to load my client i get this error:
Error: loaderror Starting up 20
Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.method8(client.java:4708)
at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:150)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:144)
at client.run(client.java:4488)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

i looked at the lines and this is what they said:
4708- aClass42_Sub1_1068.method553();
150- method8(493);
144- method3(4747);
4488- super.run();

i have never seen it before, what do i do?

also the screen on the client displays this error: sorry, an error has occurred with the client and shows steps on how to fix it, i have encountered this on rs before but not the loaderror thing.

Read full topic
